greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(a(n - 1)) + r(n) for n >= 3, where r(3*k) = a(a(k)), r(3*k+1) = a(a(k)) and r(3*k+2) = a(n-a(k)), with a(0) = 0 and a(1) = a(2) = 1.
program: print([A147665(n) for n in range(60)]) # Oct 18 2009
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Nov 09 2008
ext: Applied OEIS standards to nomenclature - The Assoc. Editors of the OEIS, Oct 18 2009
